title: Honor system
body: Soo i remember old honors had a count on how many friendly and honorable opponent stuff u get on your profile, is the tought of adding counts to the new system happening because i have a friend who calls me a flamer and all, but i just had a bad game and was raged all game but i didnt tilt and got a honor for tilt-proof i'd love to show that im not a tilting player to that friend so the count on honors would be a very nice thing to do

replies.body: Y'know I thought it felt like something was missing from the new honor system, there's no way to see anyone's progress or rank other than your own! We can't make these kinds of changes here from H&S, but if you post this kind of feedback over in Client Discussion there's a much better chance of the Devs seeing your ideas!
